sourcesContent:
Log In to ur HustleUP account!

Welcome!

 import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {LoginService} from "../login.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit{ ngOnInit(){ const token=localStorage.getItem('token'); if(token){ //if token exists in the local storage this.logged=true; } } constructor(private loginService:LoginService){ } logged:boolean=false; username:string=""; password:string=""; login(){ this.loginService.login(this.username,this.password).subscribe((data)=>{ //console.log(data); localStorage.setItem('token',data.token); this.logged=true; }); } logout(){ localStorage.removeItem('token'); //request to the django this.logged=false; } }
